title: Nidalee Add on
body:
Okay so I was playing Nidalee the other day, And I was thinking about what else could be good about her, I mean since she got nerfed a few updates ago, Something that will help bring her back up a little, What my idea is that, When a player has Ignite on, And if you throw a spear (  Q ) that you can ignite the spear, And upon hit of the target it will ignite them, Even if its just a little less damage, Then actual ignite, I think it would be an awesome little feature that you can do with nidalee, 

Like you could make a certain little something so that when you Q for nidalee, You can press D / F and ignite your spear.

I don't know just a little idea I thought some people would like? :)

replies.body: how about spear the target, then ignite them.... TADAAAAA
Dunno guys its just a thing to work on and think about, I would love to see it be applied or modified in a way that can be used in-game!

She's still strong. She just isn't flavour of the month anymore. She doesn't really need to be changed.

Also a super long range ignite? LOL you know how many times im just out of reach of ignite and they get under their tower?

Interesting idea. Nidalee's spear has a huge range though, and stuff like this would need to be implemented for a lot of characters for it to be balanced. I imagine mages would be able to pop exhaust on single target spells?
